thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Ian Hand

author: Ian Hand
title: Ian Hand
text:
I recently hired a car from Sixt, but booked through rentalcars.com, and I took advantage of rentalcars.com's full insurance cover, never expecting to need to make a claim. Anyway, it transpired that I did need to claim in my insurance. I fully expected this to be a long and drawn out process but I was very pleasantly surprised at just how quick and easy the whole process was! Within 48 hours of filling in the easy to follow online claim form, I received an email informing me that my claim was going to be settled in full.
I can't recommend rentalcars.com highly enough!
